column1: Kata Robata////Food: miso soup was average
column2: it had no mushrooms :( smoke duck salad was good
column4: but duck was not tender enough to my standards. Scallops dish was good. the soft shell crab had to much batter for my liking. a lil too heavy. i could pull pieces of batter off the soft shell thats how thick it was. carribean roll was good
column5: but had too much sauce so it made the roll soggy. the most flavorful dish i had was the uni-crab spoons
column6: but it was very little. 3 bites. for dessert
column7: we had the banana tempura. it was average. the pieces were too small and soggy because of Â too much chocolate syrup. mochi icre cream was good
column8: i like the strawberry and banana
